Articles.Content: I just insatlled the new version .25 and as soon as everything is loaded, the game crashes. i tried to validate and reinstall the game which hadn't sufficed. Pls help me!
The same thing was happening to me, but after I deleted the settings.cfg in the KSP main folder it loaded up fine. Hope this works for you.
SAME problem Here!! after loading appears wrap time x1, black screen and the birds sound, tried EVERYTHING!
